section.title: Module namespace and validation artifacts
section.para: The namespaces for Module 01 are: https://www.w3.org/2005/11/its/ and urn:oasis:names:tc:lexidma:module_01:&version;.

Validation artifacts [specify type of artifacts if any available at all] for this module are available at &this-loc;/schemas/filename1.filetype1, &this-loc;/schemas/filename2.filetype1, and &this-loc;/schemas/filename1.filetype2.

note.para: Although setting and usage of prefixes for namespaces in XML is arbitrary, we are using md01: for the http://docs.oasis-open.org/lexidma/ns/module_01-&cschversion; namespace and md01n: for the urn:oasis:names:tc:lexidma:module_01:1.0 namespace throughout this specification.
While colon ":" is the mandatory separator character in XML, other separator characters, such as hyphen "-" or undescore "_" may be used in other serializations.

section.title: Module fragment identification prefix
section.para: The fragment identification prefix for the Module 01 module is: md01.

note.para: Although this module has to use several different XML namespace prefixes it uses only one fragment identification and authority prefix which is md01.

Some Module 01 data categories.... Other data categories …. The below conformance statement is only relevant for data categories .. There is no interrelation between data categories/ data categories are related as explained in ....

listitem.para: Conformant Module 01 Processors must be able to use the external global rules included in the module's [validation artifact - adjust according to the type of validation artifact] file &this-loc;/schemas/its.sch and compute Module 01 data categories encoded in DMlex Instances as per certain conformance clauses ELABORATE

Conformant Agents must be DMLex Conformant in the sense of DMLex Application Conformance and also implement at least one Module 01 data category defined in the section Module 01 data categories defined in the Module 01 Module of this Module 01 or provide full support for at least one of the custom annotations etc. ELABORATE.
Conformant Creators must be capable of Creating at least one of the above specified Module 01 data categories in a resulting conformant DMlex Instance with Module 01 based metadata.
Conformant Enrichers must be capable of Enriching DMlex Instances with at least one of the above specified Module 01 data categories.

Conformant Modifiers must be capable of updating at least one of the above specified Module 01 data categories according to its own Constraints and Processing Requirements as specified in the Module 01 Module.

section.title: Module 01 functionality 01
section.para: Module 01 functionality 01 mechanism provides a way to record metadata..etc. ELABORATE>

warning.para: This mechanism is reserved for … ELABORATE.

note.para: The Module 01 functionality 01 mechanism has to be always used with the ELABORATE. .

listitem.para: Writers must use the attribute … ELABORATE to express the information provided through the Module 01 functionality 01 mechanism in DMLex Instances.

section.title: Module 01 functionality 01 annotation
section.para: This is used to express the Module 01 functionality 01 mechanism on inline markers.
